name: Fortress Defense
description:
Prepare for an epic battle in Fortress Defense, a thrilling castle wave defense game where you stand as the last line of defense against hordes of relentless enemy skeletons. As the commander of an elite archer squad, your mission is to protect your kingdom from the relentless skeletal onslaught. Upgrade your archers, unlock potent spells, and discover a vast arsenal of specialized arrows to fend off the unending waves of darkness.

Are you ready to rise to the occasion and prove your archery skills in the ultimate battle against the forces of darkness? Fortress Defense offers a challenging and immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you face wave after wave of skeletal foes. Can you withstand the siege and become the hero your kingdom needs?
